Another Mashu NTR doujin... time for some popcorn.
At least then I can feel like the degenerate trash I know who I am.

You just explained how to be okay with being cucked. You can't compare being cucked to a scenario where your mind thinks it's life or death. No one with a backbone enjoys seeing their significant other fucked right in front of them. When reading stuff like this, you have to understand it's not happening to you. Otherwise you begin to think this kind of thing is the best way for you to achieve climax. If you're into being cucked, that's you and yours, but that shit ain't for me. I just self insert in the place of the cucker. I would rather do the cucking instead of being cucked.

"Why do people like NTR?"
Its a fetish. There is no logical reason behind it. I personally like the rush, the fear, insecurity, dread, that comes with finding out that someone is cheating behind your back. If you cannot understand that, think of a rollar coster or bungee jumping - why do people subject themselves to something so scary? Because they love the rush! Anxiety turns into excitement if you are in a safe environment. Same with BDSM.
 
So initially you hate NTR because you don't know how to handle the feelings. If you are like most people, you leave at this point. But if you stay and conquer those insecurities, you will find it becoming something enjoyable. Or at least that's how it was for me. 

There are very few good NTR doujins. And that's because you actually have to get the reader invested in the characters at least a little. And you have to develop the relationship between the girl and the person who gets NTRed. My personal favorites are from Mashiraga Aki.
